tuning_runs.result: PASSED - Physics params cluster well: only 4 clusters (kappa x n_sources)
tuning_runs.notes: kappa: 2 values (0.05, 0.1), T0: all 0.0, BC: 2 types. Cluster sizes: [25, 23, 19, 13]

config.description: Check sensor location consistency within clusters

tuning_runs.result: FAILED - Every sample has UNIQUE sensor locations (80 unique configs for 80 samples)
tuning_runs.notes: Gappy POD requires consistent observation locations. Unique sensors defeat the purpose.

finding: Physics clustering is feasible (only 4 clusters), BUT every sample has unique sensor locations (80 unique configs). Gappy C-POD requires consistent observation points to transfer POD bases. Unique sensors mean each sample needs individual treatment, defeating the purpose.
